ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__MatchType__c, 'Configuration Attribute Value') && ISBLANK(SBQQ__TestedConfigurationAttribute__c)) ||(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__MatchType__c, 'Static Value') && ISBLANK( SBQQ__TestedValue__c)) || (ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__MatchType__c, 'Field Value') && (ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__TestedField__c, '') || ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__TestedObject__c, '')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Tested Value is required if Match Type = Static Value. Tested Object and Tested Field are required if Match Type = Field Value. Tested Configuration Attribute is required if Match Type = Configuration Attribute.
